name: Name
verify-email-message: Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
forgot-password-message: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
reset-password-message: You're almost there! Enter your new password below to complete the reset process. Make sure it's strong and unique to keep your account secure.
create-workspace-subtitle: Enhance your efficiency by streamlining access to boards, making them conveniently accessible from a centralized location for everyone.
update-workspace-subtitle: Make changes to keep your workspace up to date and aligned with your needs.
update-board-subtitle: Make changes to keep your board up to date and aligned with your needs.
workspace-name-text: This is the name of your company, team or organization.
workspace-description-text: Briefly introduce your Workspace to engage your members.
public-workspace-text: Visible to every users including guests.
create-board-subtitle: Centralized board hub for streamlined collaboration.
board-name-text: This is the name of your project, team or organization.
board-description-text: Briefly introduce your board to engage your members.
public-board-text: Visible to every users including guests.
contact-us-for-problem: If the problem persist please contact us.
empty-workspace-title: This workspace doesn't have any board yet.
empty-workspace-subtitle: Start by creating a board in your workspace.
invite-to-workspace-subtitle: Unlock the Power of Teamwork by Inviting Members to Your Workspace
invite-to-board-subtitle: Unlock the Power of Teamwork by Inviting Members to Your Board
search-by-username-or-email: Search by name or email address
default-invitation-message: Join now and let's work together.
worksapce-invitation-message-placeholder: Message that will be atttached to invitation.
invite-members-no-options: There is not results to shose.
delete-resource-desc: Are you sure you want to delete this {{resource}}? This action cannot be undone.
private-workspace-description: This Workspace is private. It's not indexed or visible to those outside the Workspace.
public-workspace-description: This Workspace is public. Its visibile publicly to everyone.
private-board-description: This board is private. It's not indexed or visible to those outside the Workspace.
public-board-description: This board is public. Its visibile to all workspace members.
permanent-action: This is permanent and can't be undone.
transform-workspace-to-an-admin: Transfer workspace ownership to one of its admins.
hero-subtitle: Seamless collaboration and organization at your fingertips.
profile-name-desc: As you'd like it to appear on your profile.
profile-email-desc: This will be used for account-related notifications and password recovery.
profile-bio-desc: Feel free to include your interests, professional background, or anything you'd like others to know.
card-no-description: It seems this task doesn't have any description yet.
